A Nixie Tube Clock Design

Digital clocks are fun electronic projects. Add some 160V nixie tubes and you get an extra layer of vintage art. I worked for Nuvitron in the past, and I took part in the design and programming of their base circuit for the Nixie Tube Clock lineup.
